sakai:title: RSS.
sakai:shortDescription: Get the content of a remote RSS feed. (no more than 100K or RSS)
sakai:description: Will retrieve the content of a remote URL, check if it is XML-valid and check some basic RSS rules.
It will then send the response back.
sakai:response:
Doing a standard query for the rss from bbc news.
Example: Request to: /var/proxy/rss.xml?rss=http://newsrss.bbc.co.uk/rss/newsonline_uk_edition/front_page/rss.xml
